properties.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Knox, IN; Gibson, IN; Pike, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 11:49AM EST until January 3 at 9:34PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...White River...

.Precipitation on Sunday and Monday have led to minor flooding conditions
along some points of the East Fork White...and White Rivers.
Significant flooding is not expected.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River at Edwardsport.
* until Friday evening.
* At  7:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 16.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by Friday
morning.
* At 17.5 feet...Flooding closes Old Vincennes Road.  High water
crosses SR 358 on the Daviess County side just west of the levee.
Flooding begins to affect higher bottomlands.  Residential property
of river cabins begins to flood.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
